text:
Manuscript Overview
Title: Predicting Adolescentsâ€™ Future Smoking Behavior through Anti-Smoking Ad Exposure
Methodology: Structural Equation Modeling (SEM) grounded in the Theory of Planned Behavior
Dataset: Monitoring the Future (MTF) 2023 Survey
Sample: ~14,000 U.S. adolescents (Grades 8 & 10)
Key Findings:

âœ… Anti-smoking ads impact beliefs via attitudes, norms, and behavior control
âœ… Strong internal consistency across TPB constructs (AVE > 0.5, CR > 0.89)
âœ… SEM results show PBC is the strongest predictor of smoking intention




Structural Equation Modeling

ATT â€“ Attitude toward smoking

INJ â€“ Injunctive norm

DES â€“ Desire to smoke

PBC â€“ Perceived behavioral control

INT â€“ Intention

SMK â€“ Future smoking behavior
